China: 1556 Shaanxi earthquake: An earthquake in and around modern Shaanxi killed some eight hundred thousand people.
Colombia: The Real Audiencia de Santafé is officially installed
East_Timor: A group of Dominican friars established the village of Lifau.
India: Humayun converts from Sunni Islam to Shia Islam, to gain the alliance of the Shah of Persia. Humayun dies, and is succeeded by his son Akbar.
Hindu king Hemu establishes 'Hindu Raj' in North India and bestowed with title of "Vikramaditya"; Second Battle of Panipat fought between Hemu and Akbar's forces in which Hemu is killed.
Russia: Muscovy conquered and annexed the Astrakhan Khanate.
Spain: Charles abdicated in favor of Philip, who became King Philip II of Spain.
